tool_description: Validates building compliance with applicable fire codes and identifies violations or deficiencies.

jurisdiction.description: Governing jurisdiction (city, county, state) for code requirements

building_type.description: Building occupancy type for code selection

recent_renovations.description: Major renovations in last 5 years requiring permits

special_use_permits.description: Special use permits or variances granted

error_messages: Unknown jurisdiction: Provide valid city, county, or state name for code lookup.
Invalid building type: Use standard occupancy classifications for code selection.
Construction year error: Year must be between 1800 and current year.
Building size error: Square footage must be positive number.
Occupant load error: Must be positive integer appropriate for building size.
Stories count error: Must be positive integer (1 or greater).
usage: Provide jurisdiction, building_type, construction_year, square_footage, occupant_load, and stories for code compliance check. Include recent_renovations and special_use_permits if applicable.

compliance_status.description: Overall compliance status (compliant, minor violations, major violations)

applicable_codes.description: Fire codes and standards applicable to this building
